about_the_game:
Dungeon Danger Traps – Supporter Pack

The Support Pack for Dungeon Danger Traps was created for those players who have already purchased the game, but still want to support our small team.

Thank you for being with us!

The Supporter Pack includes:
  • 1000 coins;
  • 2 unique runner skins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: fx 4170 or Core i3-4170
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 550 or gt1030
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: FX 8350 or i5 5400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 570 or gtx 1050ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
